meta.description: Phase 2: Project Completion Tasks - завершение недостающих компонентов на основе технического аудита

tasks.title: Backend Gamification API Completion
tasks.description: Replace mock data in gamification system with real database queries and complete API implementation
tasks.details: Implement real APIs for achievements, badges, leaderboards, and seasonal competitions to replace current mock data implementations
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for all CRUD operations, integration tests with database, API endpoint testing

subtasks.description: Implement real-time achievement progress tracking with database integration
